title: New: Jacq Becker – Till I Think About You
content:
Can’t fault an absolutely huge chorus like this one from California’s Jacq Becker on her first original track, Till I Think About You.

Getting some serious Jessie Ware and even Ellie Goulding vibes from the songwriting, and the super slick production. This is an essential summer song. Check it out below.

Like this? Follow our On Repeat Playlist for a handpicked selection of the very best in new music; updated weekly.
author: 5e9b68b27a1236eccfeb1d27
